tool_description:
OpenAI API | GPT 3.5 Turbo
Upgrade your apps with ChatGPT 3.5 Turbo API for friendlier code and improved conversations. 

Enhance user experience effortlessly while boosting your search ranking with a touch of human-like language. Transform your coding into a seamless and engaging experience, making applications smarter and more relatable. 

Elevate your projects with the power of ChatGPT 3.5 Turbo API – where simplicity meets sophistication.
name: OpenAI API | GPT 3.5 Turbo
title: OpenAI API | GPT 3.5 Turbo

api_list.name: Models List
api_list.description: Get the list of all available models.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://openai-api-gpt-3-5-turbo.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/models"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openai-api-gpt-3-5-turbo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://openai-api-gpt-3-5-turbo.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/models"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "openai-api-gpt-3-5-turbo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
